acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Marc Edelman in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.003.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Marc Edelman was involved in various progressive organizations, particularly the New York Civil Liberties Union and Reelpolitik (a Columbia University film collective).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains flyers and correspondence concerning organizations Marc Edelman was involved in, particularly the New York Civil Liberties Union and Reelpolitik (a Columbia University film collective). Also included is one file containing correspondence regarding a student riot at the High School of Music and Art and an issue of the Washington Free Press dealing with Students for a Democratic Society (SDS) action against the Pentagon.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in the 1940s-1970s, are expected to enter the public domain in 2100.
